params.name: item.id
params.doc: item id

params.name: galleryId
params.doc: id of the gallery that the item belongs

docs.summary: Partially update an item

body:
curl -X PATCH \
   'https://progallery.wixapps.net/pro-gallery-webapp/v1/galleries/2113aed5-8ebd-418a-a60b-74a799ce50e0/items/d02bd19a-c0a3-456a-9c82-32c08ceb6712' \
   --data-binary '{
                  	"item": {
                                      "id": "d02bd19a-c0a3-456a-9c82-32c08ceb6712",
                                      "mediaUrl": "https://static.wixstatic.com/media/8bb438_3ae04589aef4480e89a24d7283c69798~mv2_d_2869_3586_s_4_2.jpg",
                                      "orderIndex": 1563813116.8060222,
                                      "name": "002cd4_2d48efc3227e47b3945a682eac7f3ae1_",
                                      "title": "Newly Updated Item1",
                                      "description": "Describe your image here.",
                                      "dataType": "Photo",
                                      "photoMetadata": {
                                          "width": 2869,
                                          "height": 3586
                                      },
                                      "isSecure": false,
                                      "mediaOwner": "Undefined",
                                      "tags": []
                                  },
                        "state":"SAVED"
                  }' \
   -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
   -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>'
response:
{"item": {
  "id": "d02bd19a-c0a3-456a-9c82-32c08ceb6712",

  "modified": "2020-08-17T15:13:12Z",
  "mediaOwner": "Undefined",
  "tags": []
}}

members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

messages.name: _com_wixpress_exposure_progallery_proto_v2_GalleryV2EntityCreatedEvent
messages.displayName: Gallery V 2 Entity Created Event Object

members.name: entity
members.doc: Event body

members.name: url
members.doc: The url of the page

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: anchorName
members.doc: The name of the anchor

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: routerId
members.doc: The router that handles this link

members.name: innerRoute
members.doc: The path data we'd like

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: docId
members.doc: The id of the document

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of the document for download purposes

members.name: indexable
members.doc: If this document can be indexed by scrapers, default is false

members.name: recipient
members.doc: The email we will be sending a message to

members.name: subject
members.doc: The subject of the email

members.name: body
members.doc: The body of the email

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The phone number we want to link to

members.name: address
members.doc: An address that we can link to

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The whatsApp phone number we want to connect with

members.name: id
members.doc: item id

members.name: mediaUrl
members.doc: item url for photos or video

members.name: orderIndex
members.doc: if not present in an update it mean the item will be added as currentTimestamp

members.name: name
members.doc: item's original filename

members.name: title
members.doc: item's title

members.name: description
members.doc: item's description

members.name: link
members.doc: a link from the item to something else

members.name: dataType
members.doc: item type: text, photo or video

members.name: exif
members.doc: aka Exchangeable image file format

members.name: quality
members.doc: the image quality

members.name: unsharpMasking
members.doc: photo sharpening

members.name: amount
members.doc: number controls the amount of contrast that is added at the edges.

members.name: radius
members.doc: number in pixels. The size of the edges to be enhanced

members.name: threshold
members.doc: The minimal level of brightness change that will be sharpened

members.name: externalId
members.doc: External source's representation for this video's id

members.name: html
members.doc: text data

members.name: style
members.doc: css style info for container

members.name: editorHtml
members.doc: populated via progallery app only (ck editor format)

members.name: editorFontId
members.doc: the wix editor's font Id used to display the text data

members.name: wixLinkData
members.doc: Data on how to construct the link from wix editor inputs

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.Map representing the file format (eg mp4)  to the url. In case of an external source the format can be youtube, vimeo, etc.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: videoMode
members.doc: eg 720p, 1024p etc

members.name: urls
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Map representing the file format (eg mp4)  to the url. In case of an external source the format can be youtube, vimeo, etc.

members.name: id
members.doc: gallery id

members.name: name
members.doc: gallery name

members.name: totalItemsCount
members.doc: number of all of the items in the gallery

members.name: items
members.doc: a subset of the items in the gallery

members.name: compId
members.doc: editor component id of the gallery

members.name: created
members.doc: timestamp for gallery creation

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: timestamp for gallery creation

members.name: orderIndex
members.doc: if not present in an update it mean the item will be added as currentTimestamp

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: gallery
members.doc: the gallery being published

members.name: revision
members.doc: the gallery's published revision

members.name: siteRevision
members.doc: the revision of the site if a site publish event triggered the publish

members.name: page
members.doc: the current page being published (relevant when there are over 1000 items otherwise it will just be 0)

members.name: isRc
members.doc: indicates whether the gallery is from RC

members.name: lastUpdated
members.doc: the last time gallery or its items updated

members.name: galleryId
members.doc: the galleryId being published

members.name: gallery
members.doc: the gallery that was fully published

members.name: totalItemsCount
members.doc: total number of items in the gallery

members.name: revision
members.doc: the publish timestamp also used as a version for this gallery

members.name: siteRevision
members.doc: the revision of the site if a site publish event triggered the publish

members.name: isRc
members.doc: indicates whether the gallery is from RC

members.name: lastUpdated
members.doc: the last time gallery or its items updated

docs.summary: change to gallery deleted

members.name: galleryPage
members.doc: individual publish for each page ie subset of items

members.name: publishGalleryDone
members.doc: sent after all pages have been published

members.name: itemsLimit
members.doc: number of items to return per gallery default is 10

members.name: itemsPerGallery
members.doc: number of items to return per gallery default is 10

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of galleries to skip in the current sort order, default is 0

members.name: limit
members.doc: the amount of galleries per response, default is 10

members.name: fields
members.doc: currently only supports the field mask id

members.name: state
members.doc: State of the requested gallereis

members.name: totalGalleriesCount
members.doc: total number of galleries in a website

members.name: gallery
members.doc: galleries will be sorted by creation date

members.name: galleries
members.doc: galleries will be sorted by creation date

members.name: galleryId
members.doc: gallery id

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order, default is 0

members.name: limit
members.doc:
The amount of items per response, default is 50
limit is set to 0 when under the min and capped at 200 when over the max

members.doc: State of the requested galleries

members.name: id
members.doc: item id

members.name: mediaUrl
members.doc: item url for photos or video

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc: if not present in an update it mean the item will be added as currentTimestamp

members.name: fileName
members.doc: item's original filename

members.name: title
members.doc: item's title

members.name: description
members.doc: item's description

members.name: link
members.doc: a link from the item to something else

members.name: dataType
members.doc: item type: text, photo or video

members.name: exif
members.doc: aka Exchangeable image file format

members.name: quality
members.doc: the image quality

members.name: unsharpMasking
members.doc: photo sharpening

members.name: amount
members.doc: number controls the amount of contrast that is added at the edges.

members.name: radius
members.doc: number in pixels. The size of the edges to be enhanced

members.name: threshold
members.doc: The minimal level of brightness change that will be sharpened

members.name: externalId
members.doc: External source's representation for this video's id

members.name: html
members.doc: text data

members.name: style
members.doc: css style info for container

members.name: editorFontId
members.doc: the wix editor's font Id used to display the text data

members.name: wixLinkData
members.doc: Data on how to construct the link from wix editor inputs

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • Undefined
  • Wix
  • DeviantArt
  • Custom

Possible values are:
  • Undefined
  • Photo
  • Video
  • Text

Possible values are:
  • Undefined
  • Youtube
  • Vimeo
  • Custom

Possible values are:
  • Undefined
  • External - external link
  • Internal - link to wix pages

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • SAVED - The gallery in the Editor segment
  • PUBLISHED - The gallery in the LiveSite segment
